name: EVOREVO
description:
EVOREVO, the stage of this RPG that rebuilt the Earth's ecosystem that collapsed due to human tyranny.
Here, humans are at the bottom of the food chain, but for some reason, constant fighting continues just like the Earth.
You'll become Rope, 'a mixed-race boy who is both human and rabbit' and think about the problem of this planet where evolved animals are at odds with each other.

Key Features

  • a unique worldview that breaks prejudices against fantasy
  • Each character has its own unique skills
  • Satirical humor hidden around the game
  • Retro-style art
  • A strange ecosystem that is somewhat different from Earth
  • Various animals and various villages they built
  • There is a descendant of a locust called a 'Fairy' in EVOREVO
